name: A LEODAVINCI Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word for an underground tunnel or room, like a bear's den.
questions.explanation:
Cave.

	A cave is usually an underground opening or crack.  Some caves are small, and some are very large.  Some are natural, and others are manmade.  In some caves, bats live on the ceiling, and in other caves, bears like to go inside to sleep through the winter.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word for a straight path, or for people waiting to go on a ride.
questions.explanation:
Line.

	If you draw a straight path with a pencil, you are drawing a "line".  Also, if you are waiting for your turn to do something, for instance, to go on a ride, or buy movie tickets, you are waiting in a queue, or a line.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", that means the ground beneath your feet.
questions.explanation:
Land.

	Land is where we walk.  It can be called the ground, or the earth, but it is all land.  The earth is made up of about 30% land, and the rest is water.  That's a lot of water!

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word for a frilly, delicate fabric, using only letters in "LEODAVINCI".
questions.explanation:
Lace.

	Lace is usually a very frilly and delicate fabric.  Doilies are often made of lace, and sometimes dresses have lace all over them, especially wedding dresses.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word meaning kind.
questions.explanation:
Nice.

	When someone is kind to you, they are nice.  Nice could also be something that looks pretty or neat.  Nice is also a city in France, but it is pronounced like "niece"!

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word for a peaceful bird.
questions.explanation:
Dove.

	A dove is a bird that is often used to symbolize peace.  Dove, when pronounced differently, could also mean plunge, as in "the diver dove into the water".

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 5-letter word meaning free from dirt.
questions.explanation:
Clean.

	If something is clean, it is neat and tidy, or free from all dirt, or both.  If your parents ask you to clean the house, you might use a dustrag to get rid of all the dirt, and you might mop the floors to get rid of dirt.  You could also vacuum to get rid of dirt in the carpets.  But if they ask you to clean your room, they mean to make it neat and tidy, like putting away clothes and toys, and making your bed.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word for a big cat with a mane.
questions.explanation:
Lion.

	A lion is a big cat that lives in Africa.  The male lions have manes around their neck, and are the leader of their pride, or group.  The female lions are called lionesses, and do all the hunting for the pride.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning to have great affection for, using only letters in "LEODAVINCI".
questions.explanation:
Love.

	If you have very strong feelings for something, you "love" it.  For instance, you might really like your favorite teddy bear, so you "love" it.  You also have great feelings for your parents, because you "love" them.  Love can also be a score in tennis.

questions.text: Using only letters in "LEODAVINCI", find a 4-letter word meaning finished.
questions.explanation:
Done.

	When you are finished with something, you are done with it.  For instance, if you have put away all your laundry, and cleaned your room, and dusted the furniture, and finished all the other stuff your parents asked you to do, you are "done" with your chores. And now, you are DONE with this quiz.
